url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT readiness_score AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE readiness_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}

spec.description: Your overall recovery score. High scores (85+) indicate good readiness for physical and mental demands. Based on sleep quality, HRV, resting HR, body temperature, and activity balance.
spec.title: Readiness

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT sleep_score AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}

spec.description: Sleep quality score from 0-100. High scores (85+) indicate restorative sleep. Based on total sleep, efficiency, restfulness, REM, deep sleep, latency, and timing.
spec.title: Sleep Score

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT activity_score AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}

spec.description: Activity score measuring how well you're balancing activity and recovery. High scores (85+) indicate optimal activity levels without overtraining.
spec.title: Activity Score

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT (deep_duration + rem_duration + light_duration) / 3600.0 AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}

spec.description: Total hours of sleep (deep + REM + light). Most adults need 7-9 hours. Consistently getting less may impact recovery and readiness.
spec.title: Sleep Hours

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT heart_rate_lowest AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE heart_rate_lowest IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}

spec.description: Your lowest heart rate during sleep. Lower values typically indicate better cardiovascular fitness. Normal range is 40-70 bpm.
spec.title: Resting HR

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT hrv_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE hrv_avg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1","params":[]}

spec.description: Heart Rate Variability during sleep. Higher values indicate better recovery and autonomic nervous system balance. Track trends over time rather than absolute values.
spec.title: HRV

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, readiness_score AS readiness, sleep_score AS sleep, activity_score AS activity FROM daily_summaries WHERE day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Combined view of your three main Oura scores over time. Look for patterns and correlations between metrics.
spec.title: Readiness / Sleep / Activity

url_options.data: {"sql":"WITH d AS (SELECT day, readiness_score AS score FROM daily_summaries WHERE readiness_score IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years')) SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, score, AVG(score) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS score_7d FROM d ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: 7-day rolling average of readiness score. Smooths out daily variations to show overall trends in your recovery capacity.
spec.title: Readiness (7d rolling avg)

url_options.data: {"sql":"WITH d AS (SELECT day, sleep_score AS score FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_score IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years')) SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, score, AVG(score) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS score_7d FROM d ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: 7-day rolling average of sleep score. Helps identify sustained improvements or declines in sleep quality.
spec.title: Sleep Score (7d rolling avg)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, (deep_duration + rem_duration + light_duration) / 3600.0 AS hours FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Total hours of sleep per night (deep + REM + light). Target 7-9 hours for optimal recovery.
spec.title: Total Sleep Hours

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, deep_duration/3600.0 AS deep, rem_duration/3600.0 AS rem, light_duration/3600.0 AS light FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Breakdown of sleep into stages. Deep sleep is restorative for body, REM for mind. Light sleep is transitional. Balance varies by individual.
spec.title: Sleep Stages (hours)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, sleep_efficiency AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_efficiency IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Percentage of time in bed actually asleep. 85%+ is considered good. Lower values may indicate sleep onset issues or restlessness.
spec.title: Sleep Efficiency %

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, sleep_latency AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_latency IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Time it takes to fall asleep in minutes. 10-20 minutes is ideal. Consistently high values may indicate sleep onset issues.
spec.title: Sleep Latency (min)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, heart_rate_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND heart_rate_avg IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Average heart rate during sleep. Typically 10-30 bpm lower than waking HR. Track for changes that may indicate illness or overtraining.
spec.title: Avg HR (sleep)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, hrv_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND hrv_avg IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Average HRV during sleep. Higher is generally better, indicating good recovery. More meaningful when tracking trends over weeks.
spec.title: Avg HRV (sleep)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, breath_avg AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND breath_avg IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Average breathing rate during sleep in breaths per minute. Normal range is 12-20 bpm. Changes may indicate respiratory issues or stress.
spec.title: Respiratory Rate (sleep)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, sleep_restfulness AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE sleep_restfulness IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Count of restless periods during sleep. Lower is better. High values may indicate sleep disruptions or stress.
spec.title: Restless Periods

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, temperature_deviation AS value FROM sleep_episodes WHERE type='long_sleep' AND temperature_deviation IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Deviation from your baseline body temperature in Celsius. Small variations are normal. Large deviations may indicate illness, stress, or menstrual cycle changes.
spec.title: Temperature Deviation

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, activity_steps AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_steps IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Daily step count. General target is 7,000-10,000 steps per day for health benefits.
spec.title: Steps

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, activity_total_calories AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_total_calories IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Total calories burned including basal metabolism and activity. Varies based on body size, age, and activity level.
spec.title: Calories Burned

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, activity_active_calories AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_active_calories IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Calories burned through physical activity (excludes basal metabolism). Higher intensity activities burn more.
spec.title: Active Calories

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', substr(start_datetime,1,10)) AS week, COUNT(*) AS workouts FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years') GROUP BY week ORDER BY week","params":[]}

spec.description: Number of recorded workouts per week. Consistency matters more than quantity. Most people benefit from 3-5 workouts weekly.
spec.title: Workouts per Week

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', substr(start_datetime,1,10)) AS week, SUM((julianday(end_datetime)-julianday(start_datetime))*24) AS hours FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years') GROUP BY week ORDER BY week","params":[]}

spec.description: Weekly workout hours. Balance training volume with adequate recovery time.
spec.title: Workout Duration per Week (hours)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT COALESCE(activity_label,'unknown') AS activity, COUNT(*) AS count FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years') GROUP BY activity ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 12","params":[]}

spec.description: Most common workout types over the last 2 years. Helps identify your preferred activities and training patterns.
spec.title: Workout Types (top 12)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS value FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years')","params":[]}

spec.description: Total number of recorded workouts in the last 2 years. Track overall training consistency and volume over time.
spec.title: Total Workouts (2y)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT SUM((julianday(end_datetime)-julianday(start_datetime))*24) AS value FROM activity_logs WHERE type='workout' AND start_datetime>=datetime('now','-2 years')","params":[]}

spec.description: Total hours spent working out over the last 2 years. Useful for understanding long-term training load and commitment.
spec.title: Total Workout Hours (2y)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, stress_index AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE stress_index IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: Daily stress index. Higher values indicate more physiological stress. Track patterns and correlate with life events, training, and sleep quality.
spec.title: Stress Index Over Time

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, resilience_contributors_stress AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE resilience_contributors_stress IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: How well you recover from stress during the day. Higher scores mean better stress management and recovery capacity during waking hours.
spec.title: Daytime Recovery (Resilience)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, resilience_contributors_sleep AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE resilience_contributors_sleep IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years') ORDER BY day","params":[]}

spec.description: How well you recover during sleep. Higher scores indicate more restorative sleep and better overnight recovery from stress.
spec.title: Sleep Recovery (Resilience)

url_options.data: {"sql":"WITH joined AS (SELECT ds.day, ds.readiness_score AS readiness, (se.deep_duration + se.rem_duration + se.light_duration)/3600.0 AS sleep_h FROM daily_summaries ds JOIN sleep_episodes se ON ds.day=se.day AND se.type='long_sleep' WHERE ds.day>=date('now','-1 year') AND ds.readiness_score IS NOT NULL) SELECT CASE WHEN sleep_h<6 THEN '<6h' WHEN sleep_h<7 THEN '6-7h' WHEN sleep_h<8 THEN '7-8h' ELSE '8h+' END AS bucket, ROUND(AVG(readiness),1) AS avg_readiness FROM joined GROUP BY bucket ORDER BY bucket","params":[]}

spec.description: Average readiness score grouped by sleep quality buckets. Shows how sleep duration/quality affects your next-day recovery capacity.
spec.title: Avg Readiness by Sleep Bucket (last 1y)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', day) AS week, ROUND(AVG(readiness_score),1) AS readiness, ROUND(AVG(sleep_score),1) AS sleep, ROUND(AVG(activity_score),1) AS activity FROM daily_summaries WHERE day>=date('now','-1 year') GROUP BY week ORDER BY week","params":[]}

spec.description: Weekly average of all three main scores (Readiness, Sleep, Activity) over the last year. Helps spot seasonal patterns and long-term trends.
spec.title: Avg Scores per Week (last 1y)

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT 'daily_summaries' AS resource, MIN(day) AS min_day, MAX(day) AS max_day, COUNT(*) AS records FROM daily_summaries UNION ALL SELECT 'sleep_episodes', MIN(day), MAX(day), COUNT(*) FROM sleep_episodes UNION ALL SELECT 'heart_rate_samples', MIN(substr(timestamp,1,10)), MAX(substr(timestamp,1,10)), COUNT(*) FROM heart_rate_samples UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_logs', MIN(substr(start_datetime,1,10)), MAX(substr(start_datetime,1,10)), COUNT(*) FROM activity_logs","params":[]}

spec.description: Data availability by Oura resource type. Helps identify gaps in data collection or sync issues with the Oura API.
spec.title: Coverage by Resource

url_options.data: {"sql": "SELECT stress_index AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE stress_index IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1", "params": []}

spec.description: Daily stress level based on heart rate, HRV, and activity patterns. Lower values indicate less physiological stress. High values may indicate overtraining or life stress.
spec.title: Stress Index

url_options.data: {"sql": "SELECT CASE resilience_level WHEN 'limited' THEN 1 WHEN 'adequate' THEN 2 WHEN 'solid' THEN 3 WHEN 'strong' THEN 4 ELSE NULL END AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE resilience_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1", "params": []}

spec.description: Your ability to manage stress and recover. Values: 'limited', 'adequate', 'solid', 'strong'. Based on sleep recovery and daytime stress management.
spec.title: Resilience

url_options.data: {"sql": "SELECT spo2_percentage AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE spo2_percentage IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1", "params": []}

spec.description: Blood oxygen saturation percentage during sleep. Normal range is 95-100%. Lower values may indicate breathing disturbances or sleep apnea.
spec.title: SpO2 %

url_options.data: {"sql": "SELECT cv_age_offset AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE cv_age_offset IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1", "params": []}

spec.description: Your cardiovascular age compared to your actual age. Negative values mean your heart is 'younger' than your age. Based on resting HR and HRV patterns.
spec.title: CV Age Offset

url_options.data: {"sql": "SELECT vo2_max AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE vo2_max IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1", "params": []}

spec.description: Maximum oxygen consumption during exercise. Higher values indicate better cardiovascular fitness. Measured in ml/kg/min.
spec.title: VO2 Max

url_options.data:
{"sql": "SELECT 
            day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time,
            readiness_activity_balance AS activity_balance,
            readiness_body_temperature AS body_temp,
            readiness_hrv_balance AS hrv_balance,
            readiness_previous_day_activity AS prev_day_activity,
            readiness_previous_night_sleep AS prev_night,
            readiness_recovery_index AS recovery_index,
            readiness_resting_heart_rate AS resting_hr,
            readiness_sleep_balance AS sleep_balance
        FROM daily_summaries 
        WHERE day >= date('now', '-90 days') 
        ORDER BY day", "params": []}

spec.description: Breakdown of what's driving your readiness score. All contributors are scored 0-100. Focus on the lowest contributors to improve overall readiness.
spec.title: Readiness Contributors

url_options.data:
{"sql": "SELECT 
            day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time,
            sleep_deep_sleep AS deep_sleep,
            sleep_efficiency AS efficiency,
            sleep_latency AS latency,
            sleep_rem_sleep AS rem_sleep,
            sleep_restfulness AS restfulness,
            sleep_timing AS timing,
            sleep_total_sleep AS total_sleep
        FROM daily_summaries 
        WHERE day >= date('now', '-90 days') 
        ORDER BY day", "params": []}

spec.description: Breakdown of what's driving your sleep score. All contributors are scored 0-100. REM and deep sleep are critical for recovery.
spec.title: Sleep Contributors

url_options.data:
{"sql": "SELECT 
            day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time,
            activity_meet_daily_targets AS meet_targets,
            activity_move_every_hour AS move_hourly,
            activity_recovery_time AS recovery_time,
            activity_stay_active AS stay_active,
            activity_training_frequency AS train_freq,
            activity_training_volume AS train_vol
        FROM daily_summaries 
        WHERE day >= date('now', '-90 days') 
        ORDER BY day", "params": []}

spec.description: Breakdown of what's driving your activity score. Meet daily targets and stay active throughout the day for best results.
spec.title: Activity Contributors

url_options.data: {"sql": "SELECT spo2_breathing_disturbance_index AS value FROM daily_summaries WHERE spo2_breathing_disturbance_index IS NOT NULL ORDER BY day DESC LIMIT 1", "params": []}

spec.description: Breathing disturbance index during sleep. Higher values may indicate sleep apnea or breathing issues. Values over 30 warrant medical consultation.
spec.title: Breathing Disturbance

url_options.data:
{"sql": "SELECT 
            day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time,
            spo2_breathing_disturbance_index AS value
        FROM daily_summaries 
        WHERE spo2_breathing_disturbance_index IS NOT NULL 
            AND day >= date('now', '-90 days') 
        ORDER BY day", "params": []}

spec.description: Track breathing disturbances over time. Consistent high values (>30) may indicate sleep apnea.
spec.title: Breathing Disturbance Index

url_options.data:
{"sql": "SELECT 
            day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time,
            stress_index AS stress,
            readiness_hrv_balance AS hrv
        FROM daily_summaries 
        WHERE stress_index IS NOT NULL 
            AND readiness_hrv_balance IS NOT NULL
            AND day >= date('now', '-90 days')
        ORDER BY day", "params": []}

spec.description: How stress and HRV relate over time. When stress increases (peaks), HRV often decreases (valleys). Use this to see your stress-recovery patterns.
spec.title: Stress Index vs HRV Balance

url_options.data:
{"sql": "SELECT 
            day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time,
            activity_training_volume AS training,
            readiness_score AS readiness
        FROM daily_summaries 
        WHERE activity_training_volume IS NOT NULL 
            AND readiness_score IS NOT NULL
            AND day >= date('now', '-90 days')
        ORDER BY day", "params": []}

spec.description: See how training load affects readiness. High training with sustained high readiness = good adaptation. High training with dropping readiness = need recovery.
spec.title: Training Volume vs Readiness

url_options.data:
{"sql": "SELECT 
            ds.day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time,
            (se.deep_duration + se.rem_duration + se.light_duration) / 3600.0 AS hours,
            ds.readiness_sleep_balance AS balance
        FROM daily_summaries ds
        LEFT JOIN sleep_episodes se ON ds.day = se.day AND se.type = 'long_sleep'
        WHERE ds.day >= date('now', '-90 days')
        ORDER BY ds.day", "params": []}

spec.description: Track sleep accumulation. Sleep Balance shows if you're building sleep debt (decreasing) or paying it off (increasing). Compare to actual hours slept.
spec.title: Sleep Hours vs Sleep Balance

url_options.data: {"sql": "WITH d AS (SELECT day, activity_score AS score FROM daily_summaries WHERE activity_score IS NOT NULL AND day >= date('now', '-2 years')) SELECT day||'T00:00:00Z' AS time, score, AVG(score) OVER (ORDER BY day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS score_7d FROM d ORDER BY day", "params": []}

spec.description: 7-day rolling average of activity score. Smooths out daily variations to show overall trends in your activity balance and consistency.
spec.title: Activity Score (7d rolling avg)
